newsitem.title: SPAIN: TENNIS-RAIN DELAYS BARCELONA TENNIS FINAL.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-RAIN DELAYS BARCELONA TENNIS FINAL.

text.p: Rain delayed the start of the final at the Barcelona Open men's tennis tournament on Sunday and organisers said they were pessimistic about getting the match on court.
Albert Costa had been due to play fellow Spaniard Albert Portas, a qualifier, in the final of the claycourt event at 1230 GMT.
Organisers said the rain looked set to continue and they would make an announcement about the match at around 1430 GMT.
